text: Philippine Leroy-Beaulieu (born 25 April 1963) is a French actress. Her father is actor Philippe Leroy. In 1985, she played her first major screen role (and earned a nomination for the CÃ©sar Award for Most Promising Actress), playing the mother in Trois hommes et un couffin (Three Men and a Cradle). She starred in the title role of the French movie Natalia, which was screened at the 1988 Cannes Film Festival. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:French movie actors Category:French stage actors Category:French television actors Category:Actors from Rome
title: Philippine Leroy-Beaulieu
